penguins.name: Asian Penguin
penguins.description: The Asian penguin is a species of penguin found in the Southern Hemisphere. It is the smallest of the penguin species, with a length of only 1.2 m (3.5 ft) and a weight of only 0.5 kg (1 lb).

penguins.name: Doctor Penguin
penguins.description: The Doctor Penguin is a species of penguin found in the Southern Hemisphere.
